name: Ray Game Bros | GMTK Game Jam 2021
name_original: Ray Game Bros | GMTK Game Jam 2021
description:
Ray Game Bros is a 2D platformer where you manipulate level to advance. Find all lost bros to regain full power! Join your colors and sounds ;)

Controls:
- Left & Right arrows / A & D keys to move
- Space to jump
- 1, 2, 3 keys - use abilities

---
Credits:
- Level sprites: "Pixel Adventure 1" by Pixel Frog
- Character sprites: "Simple 2D Platformer Assets Pack" by Goldmetal
- Rest: me :)
---
This is my first ever Game Jam and a first completed game! Yay! Thanks for playing!
